title: Python (programming language)
summary: Python is a high-level, interpreted programming language known for its readability and broad standard library. It supports multiple programming paradigms and is widely used in web development, data science, and automation.

quiz.question: Who created Python?
quiz.explanation: Guido van Rossum created Python and released it in 1991.

quiz.question: Which of the following is a feature of Python?
options: Readability and a large standard library
quiz.explanation: Python emphasizes readability and has a large standard library supporting many tasks.
